revised_title: Biological Factors Influencing Migrant Pest Populations
tldr: This article discusses the biological factors influencing the migration and behavior of migrant pests, particularly locusts. It highlights the importance of understanding these factors for effective locust control and the role of meteorology in their migration patterns. The author also mentions the need for more research and collaboration to address the challenges posed by these pests.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Ecology and Environmental Science
